Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it offers, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This special offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to secure a high-quality solution at a competitive rate. We are confident that once you experience the product's capabilities, you will see the value it adds to your operations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
